name: Thuocsi.Vn
tagline: B2B health and personal care distribution/sourcing platform for Vietnam and emerging markets
description:
Thuocsi.vn is a B2B pharmaceutical platform which enables hospitals, clinics, doctors, pharmacies to research and order pharmaceuticals. We are aiming to modernize Vietnam's healthcare distribution by developing a platform which enables fast, efficient, and cost effective solutions for all players in the industry so patients can receive better drugs, and less bullshit*.

Thuocsi.vn is aiming to become a platform that extends beyond Vietnam and Pharmaceutical to modernize traditional distribution channels.  We believe many people are involved in traditional distribution channels either as entrepreneurs or employees, but continue to operate in a sector of the economy which goes unseen and unappreciated and marginally sustainable for livable lifestyle. By aiming to develop a modern platform for traditional distribution channel, we can change traditional distribution channels to enable entrepreneurs and people that support such channels maintain a higher quality of life.
